title: Retry deployment by forcing a fresh build

requirements.text: Trigger a deployment retry by updating the marker file at frontend/public/deploy-retry.txt so its contents change (e.g., update the ISO timestamp on the first line) without changing application functionality.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/public/deploy-retry.txt has a modified first-line timestamp/string so the file diff is non-empty.
No other files are changed as part of this request.
The application behavior and user-facing UI text remain unchanged (this is a deploy-trigger only).

constraints: Do not introduce any functional code changes; this request is only to force a fresh deployment build.
Keep all user-facing text in English.
nonGoals: Fixing the stopped-canister condition in code.
Changing backend logic, schema, or authorization.
UI/UX changes to the Debug Panel or provisioning flow.
